title: Vanessa Hayward on Twitter: "Here's why we need to refuse the straw ...
body: "Here's why we need to refuse the straw. Compelling Tedx talk by @rachellsarnoff https://t.co/G1R4UQxAiB via @youtube"
readable_content:
Vanessa Hayward (2023-01-01): Here’s why we need to refuse the straw. Compelling Tedx talk by @rachellsarnoff https://youtube.com/watch?v=sOol1MIgois&sns=tw… via @youtube

YouTube (2023-01-01): Can One Straw Change The World? | Rachel Lincoln Sarnoff | TEDxSant... Single-use plastics like cups, bags, bottles and straws contribute to the eight million tons of non-biodegradable plastic that we send to the ocean each year...

- Vanessa Hayward (2023-01-01): from Los Angeles, CA
- Vanessa Hayward (2023-01-01): elementary school math nerd, teacher, mother of 2 boys, brit
summary:
The conversation highlights the negative impact of single-use plastics on the environment, emphasizing the need to refuse plastic straws. The sentiment is concerned about the environmental impact of plastic waste. 

Sentiment: 0.8
